title: haridhaasulu veDalu
sahitya:
haridAsulu veDalu muccaTa gani AnandamAye dayALO



anupallavi



hari gOvinda narahari rAmakrSNa ani varusaga nAmamulu karuNatO jEyuvu



caraNam 1



sangatigAnu mrdanga ghOSamulace pongucu vIdhula kEgucu merayucu



caraNam 2



cakkani haricE jikkitimani madi sokkucu nAmanE dikkani pogaDucu



caraNam 3



diTTamuga naDu gaTTutO naDugulu beTTucu tALamu baTTi galgallanaga



caraNam 4



 jnAnamutO rAma dhyAnamutO manci gAnamutO mEnu dAna mosangucu



caraNam 5



rAjarAju nipai jAjulu callucu rAjillalucu tyAgarAjunitO gUDi
